title: 关于命令方块刷出刷怪笼的问题
author: aill
txt_content: /setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0replace  {EntityId:Skeleton,SpawnCount:1,SpawnRange:4,RequiredPlayerRange:100,Delay:100,MinSpawnDelay:100,MaxSpawnDelay:300,MaxNearbyEntities:10,SpawnData:{Equipment:[{id:0,Count:1},{id:381,Count:1},{id:371,Count:1},{id:384,Count:1},{id:397,damage:2,Count:1}],DropChances:[1.0F,0.3F,1.0F,1.0F,0.0F],Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:50},{Name:generic.followRange,Base:15},{Name:generic.movementSpeed,Base:0.25},{Name:generic.knockbackResistance,Base:1.0},{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:4}],ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,Duration:300000,Amplifier:1,Ambient:1}]}}可以正常刷怪，且掉落正常，但就是生命值改不了，不管命令中的maxHealth是多少，在游戏里都是20的血。速度，击退，攻击都可以正常改

replies.txt_content: 说出你要改的内容，我给你个代码

replies.author: pca006132
replies.txt_content: max Health 只是他最大的生命值,要改生命值,除了這個,還要加 HealF

吊吊的/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace 
{EntityId:Zombie,
SpawnCount:3,
SpawnRange:2,
RequiredPlayerRange:24,
Delay:10,

MaxSpawnDelay:100,

replies.author: aill
replies.txt_content:
pca006132 发表于 2015-2-12 16:44
max Health 只是他最大的生命值,要改生命值,除了這個,還要加 HealF
怎么加,还是属性吗
前排帮顶。祝早日解决。祝早日解决。{:10_524:}
